actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-678.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 230 - 153 (Record Vote No: 88).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 290) expressing the sense of the Congress that no appropriated funds shall be used for the purpose of mining the ports or territorial waters of Nicaragua.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H. Con. Res. 290 (mining of Nicaraguan waters).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 290) expressing the sense of the Congress that no appropriated funds shall be used for the purpose of mining the ports or territorial waters of Nicaragua.
